column4: How do I find out which program was written in which language?
look at the source code or look for docs on it
i tried.. there must be an easier way
what program?
well.. lets say.. xchat
or gaim
pick an app but i believe both are C or C++
is there a definite way to know?
like a database?
look at the source code. alot of apps are not written in one lang.
no no database that im aware of
.. so one program can be made of many languages? ... twisted...
yes
most likely its your Usplash configuration (i cant think of the usplash folder off hand)
? usplash ?
yes usplash. madman91 please run sudo nano /boot/grub/menu.lst
but where did you get usplash from? ... i didnt ask anything about booting
99% of time when you boot you get that because the usplash is at a higher rate than your monitor
i told you what to do
while booting == im betting you never see usplsh
NO.. it was madmax .. not madman91
